fieldName: Role played by Owner or Manager in Facility
cmsColumnHeader: Role played by Owner or Manager in Facility
description: Role description; possible values are: 5% or greater direct ownership interest; 5% or greater indirect ownership interest; 5% OR GREATER MORTGAGE INTEREST; 5% OR GREATER SECURITY INTEREST; CONTRACTED MANAGING EMPLOYEE; W-2 MANAGING EMPLOYEE; CORPORATE DIRECTOR; CORPORATE OFFICER; OPERATIONAL/MANAGERIAL CONTROL; GENERAL PARTNERSHIP INTEREST; LIMITED PARTNERSHIP INTEREST
Indicates if owner is an individual or organization (Individual or Organization)
Ownership percentage – value provided only for owners with role description of "5% or greater direct ownership interest" or "5% or greater indirect ownership interest"
Date when given owner/manager became associated with provider in this role
Location of facility (provider address, city, state, zip)
